metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3709 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Possible cross-site scripting vulnerability in libxml after commit 960f0e2.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3709` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.4
libxml2-utils - 2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.4
python-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.4
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.10+dfsg-5ubuntu0.20.04.4').
